system.notes: Must be Hulking Sized Ork to Wear. +10 to Strength Characteristic, +1 Size. Environmentally sealed with 6 hours of air, has inbuilt Best Quality Advanced Helmet Systems. Power lasts 18 Hours before needing Recharge. (Thermal Vision, +20 Perception in Darkness, Dark Sight+Heightened Senses (Sight), Free Action Awareness to Spot Hidden enemies)
